Hand Talk Translator

Brief: The Hand Talk Translator is an award-winning mobile application designed as a digital bridge to foster communication between deaf, hard of hearing individuals, and the hearing world. The app features Hugo, an animated character who translates text and audio into American Sign Language (ASL), serving as a versatile tool for various users including students, teachers, families, and anyone keen on learning ASL.
